name: Lager Network Technologies Game Resource Archive
summary: Learn about .LPQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Lager Network Technologies is a software developer that specializes in producing massively multiplayer online (MMO) video games. Some of the games Lager Network Technologies develops use game resource archives that are saved as LPQ files.

Primarily, LPQ files contain images that are shown in-game. For example, an LPQ file may contain textures, icons, and other images. LPQ files are compressed using LZO (Lempel-Ziv-Oberhume) compression.

instructions: Various Lager Network Technologies video games load in-game images from LPQ files. Outside of these games, no other known programs can open LPQ files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
